name: Duelity (JoshiJ10)
description:
Stylised DDR Cat vs Dog Rhythm game where the goal is to win human affection.... by doing dance poses. The cats fight the dogs in an effort to get their master’s attention and loving affection. 

Controls are: Up, Down, Left, Right - input buttons You win by surviving the entire song track.

The team consists of:

Josh - UI and Front-end Game Design

Ghan - 3D Modelling and Animation

Finn - Music and Sound

Clinton - Back-end and Coding Architecture
